website_summaries.verdict: Simple and oh-so-cool for your cat that may not appreciate a full-body Halloween costume.
pros: These glasses turn any cat into an instant hipster and serve as a quick and easy Halloween costume
Cats seem to appreciate how light the sunglasses are while we love their organic, trendy vibe
cons: While a strap would help secure the glasses, it may also detract from their effortless appearance

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Love these little glasses. My cat is ridiculous, she love these glasses and poses in them for pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sweet nephew. He looks so handsome and he doesn't seem to be opposed to wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Nikyma

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: The lenses aren’t yellow as pictured. Mine are ombré blue/pink and are much more transparent, more like fashion glasses than actual sunglasses. I still love them & they make Archie look fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: It’s personal

customer_reviews.title: More reasons for cats to hate us lol
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly and they're so tiny! They stay on and it takes them a while to kick them off . Quality was pretty good. I have some regular size Lennon glasses, and they're definitely same great quality. Yay for cats!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Cool Cats only
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It fit my cat and he is looking like one snazzy puss. Cat's don't like to be clothed, so he'll only tolerate it for a little bit before knocking it off. Can't say I expected any different.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo R

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but...
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but....... could not keep on my cat’s head. It would be better if it was adjustable or it had a strap to secure it.
customer_reviews.author: P. T.

customer_reviews.title: Makes your pet supercool!
customer_reviews.text: Purrrfect little glasses for my Babyluvz! He is cool, but upped his cool factor with these! They stayed on his face, which is great, cause it's flat. They are made really well, better than a lot of my sunglasses! Overall, 5 stars! Super cute and loved them!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable - pet sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: My cat won't keep them on for long, but just the fact that I was able to get a few pictures of her with them on was enough for me. She looked so freaking cute in them! I'm sure I'll get them on her again. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Betti726

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy considering they're made for pets. They stayed on the cats well enough to get the funny photo.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Baza

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Made for great laughters!!! Very cute, on the small side. They are great for my smaller cat but too small for my big head boy cat!
customer_reviews.author: camilla cantelli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is now a movie star!!!! Fit perfectly and he actually wears them-he thinks he is "da bomb."
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: FIt Great, Cat will wear them
customer_reviews.text: Andrew likes his glasses and will wear them. Definitely a conversation piece. I will buy multiple pair if I ever need to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These glasses was so adorable, my other cat kind of stretched them out so they won’t fit on my other cat anymore but it’s ok lol they’re a great laugh
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Slightly fall off but I loved them
customer_reviews.text: Going with my cat's costume and he killed the look. They do fall off when he looks down but it's okay because they fit good. Hopefully, I get them to stay for Halloween
customer_reviews.author: A.N.C

customer_reviews.title: Great quality  but can cause high stress on cats
customer_reviews.text: Quality of glasses were great, very sturdy and well made. Unfortunately, my cats were completely uncomfortable wearing them, as I anticipated. I think they’re fine for indoors but make sure if you put them on your cat while outdoors that your cat doesn’t run off. My cat ran from me while wearing them and I felt terrible, as it was obvious she couldn’t see well and they had put her at high stress.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Funny, but cats might not like them
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are hilarious on my cats, but they don't like to wear them often. And they're kind of hard to keep on
customer_reviews.author: rdurs95

customer_reviews.title: Cute cat shades!
customer_reviews.text: These were so cute for my cat! I bought them for a picture and they came exactly as expected. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Petri

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too small/won't stay on cat's face
customer_reviews.text: It was definitely too small for either of my cats. Too bad as it is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Soverybored

customer_reviews.title: Cat is not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Sunglasses are cute. One cat will not wear them. The other looks like she wants to bite my face while I sleep tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Purrrfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit on my little kitten and we had a cute photo shoot!
customer_reviews.author: lilangelsmom

customer_reviews.title: Cool for Cats
customer_reviews.text: My daughter purchased these for her cat and they are so cute. The sunglasses are very well made and fit the cat perfectly. Love this item!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Cool glasses
customer_reviews.text: If you could select the color it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: e.l.

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my small dog well
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Pomeranian mix, did not fit her well and these are not very flexible. Returned and will try again for a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: J. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious
customer_reviews.text: I can't say my cat was thrilled when I put them on her but I got a great laugh out of it so I'm pleased with the product. Going to try them on my mother's cocker spaniel next.
customer_reviews.author: Keara

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: It is tight so it doesn't move when it's on my cat. Only use it for short photoshoots when we go on vacation and she doesn't seem to mind
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: works but...
customer_reviews.text: great but hard to keep on the cats head maybe if it had elastic on the back to keep on the cats head. He would have them off in 2 seconds every time.
customer_reviews.author: IslandAggie777

customer_reviews.title: YES! Need these.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Definitely recommend buying a pair of these for your kitty! 💙
customer_reviews.author: Arline Allen

customer_reviews.title: Just love these sunglasses 😎
customer_reviews.text: Cute, Perfect Fit & looks old Cool. Paired with hooded tees: Zorro at 17.5 lbs & Mushina at 16.8 lbs. Purchased Extra-Large for both and really pleased. Tees are Comfy, Cute & Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.author: malteseFalcon

customer_reviews.title: Cool Cat
customer_reviews.text: Listen, if you want the coolest cat on the block buy these immediately and thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Francis

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My cats didn't enjoy wearing these but they looked fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: NYmom

customer_reviews.title: Do it for the gram
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute but my cat won’t keep them on.
customer_reviews.author: Karenza

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses! Just won’t stay on my pet’s head.
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are good quality. Received them in the blue color and they’re super cute. They don’t fit my dog’s head though and she always flings them off. I don’t think she likes them very much. Wish they had some sort of strap so they’d stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: The color you receive is random
customer_reviews.text: They are cool, but what I received is not what was pictured. You should be able to choose the color you want.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious
customer_reviews.text: These are hilarious! My cat looked like a little hippie while wearing them. :-)
customer_reviews.author: ejr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses but they definitely don't stay on long on their own
customer_reviews.author: Isadora

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for small pets
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my holland lop bunny! Wish I could’ve picked a color but I do love the color I received.
customer_reviews.author: ngan

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious! I want a (bigger) pair for me! :D They are VERY small!
customer_reviews.author: KMM

customer_reviews.title: Super cute. My maltese doesn't exactly appreciate them but ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. My maltese doesn't exactly appreciate them but they are adorable for a picture. They're a bit tight if I put them over her eyes but fit perfectly if they're propped up on her head
customer_reviews.author: Leslie DePeyster

customer_reviews.title: These are hands down the best purchase of my life.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! Absolutely hilarious and had such an amazing time putting them on my cousins cat. He looked like a jazzy saxophone player
customer_reviews.author: Nezzie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got lucky that I got the color I wanted. They’re very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Loveee them although I didn’t get to choose the color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need these.
customer_reviews.text: So my cat totally did not like these but it was worth the 20 seconds she will keep them on. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Lopes

customer_reviews.title: Not the right color
customer_reviews.text: Was not the color shown in the picture. I received a pair of solid black glasses, which doesnt show up very well on my black cat who I bought it for
customer_reviews.author: Serrah

customer_reviews.title: epic
customer_reviews.text: bought these so my cat and I could be twins. they look so sick on him. absolutely killer. only complaint is that they need to come with a darn strap so they can stay on his head :D
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Shortridge

customer_reviews.title: Fit Well
customer_reviews.text: They are a little darker than I’d like, but great for a couple of cute photos of your cat.
customer_reviews.author: nb

customer_reviews.title: Best for small dogs/cats under 10lbs
customer_reviews.text: The cuteness overload is irresistible! And my dog actually likes wearing them..
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: These little glasses are so cute ! Love them.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were cuter in real life than the picture love them.
customer_reviews.author: tyanna k.

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase for a pet
customer_reviews.text: These are very small and would not fit anything but a small stuffed animal
customer_reviews.author: HoosierK

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE NOT MIRRORED
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that they were not mirrored. I would not order again because I wanted the mirrored ones.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jamieson

customer_reviews.title: Small size dogs and cats
customer_reviews.text: I love this glasses!! My dog and cat used them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Coolrunner Cute and Funny Pet Sunglasses Classic Retro Circular Metal Prince Sunglasses for Cats or Small Dogs Fashion Costume
feature_bullets: Size: Frame width about 8cm/3.15in;Lens Diameter about 3cm/ 1.18in. Suitable for small dogs or cats such as Chihuahua, Pomeranian, Small Poodle, Yorkshire, Shorthair, Persian, Puppet, etc.
No clear lenses, your pets will looks fashion and cool with our punk rock sunglasses.
The lenses are made of AC resin, spectacles frame using alloy metal, let the glasses looks very texture.
Legs of glasses are made of spring, more comfortable to wear and it's the best decorations for pets' photographing.

Color: Random delivery (If you buy more than one,the color you received may be the same color or different colors). If you're not completely satisfied with our products, just contact us without hesitation and we'll provide you the best service.
